div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p:
Be like Annagrace, an eighth grader at NLRMS -- 7th & 8th Grade Campus. Choose NLRSD!
Register NOW to enroll in our district through School Choice for the 2020-21 school year by contacting Micheal Stone at stonem@nlrsd.org.
The deadline is 5/1. Learn about us at nlrsd.org. view image

Kindergarten Registration is underway. You may register at nlrsd.org.
You will find step-by-step instructions and messages from each campus. We canceled Kindergarten Roundup due to COVID-19.
We welcome you and your kindergartner to NLRSD! view image

We want to salute all of the Assistant Principals throughout our district. Their passion for students and learning is not unnoticed, especially during these unprecedented times. Thank you for being a great part of NLRSD! Happy National Assistant Principals Week! view image

Sixth Grade Parents: The nurse from NLRMS 6th Grade Campus will be at school on Friday, April 10, from 9 a.m. until noon to distribute any medicine that was left at school for their child. Parents will need to bring a form of ID with them. view image

North Little Rock, AR 72114
